description: Try our easy to follow Chia Bircher recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chia Bircher Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup Uncle Tobys Oats Traditional Porridge

recipeInstructions.text: Reserve 12 of the raspberries. Mash remaining raspberries in a medium bowl with yoghurt until combined. Add chia seeds, vanilla and maple syrup. Cover; refrigerate overnight.

To make toasted muesli, place oats on an oven tray. Bake for 5 minutes or until lightly browned. Add almonds, cinnamon and maple syrup; mix well. Bake for another 5 minutes or until nuts are golden. Cool.

Spoon half the yoghurt mixture among four 1-cup (250ml) jars. Top with half the pomegranate seeds and toasted muesli. Repeat layering with remaining yoghurt mixture, pomegranate seeds and toasted muesli. Serve topped with reserved raspberries.
